short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension plays Italian Mood Radio streaming

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds Italian Mood Radio player to your browser.
Surf the web while listening to Italian Mood Radio. 
Italian Mood Radio is a radio that promotes indie musicians all over the world under Creative Commons and Copyleft licensing system.

You can stream your music, or you live shows at Italian Mood Radio. It's simple. Just contact us radio@italianmood.net
